title: How to Block and Unblock Someone on TikTok

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. This looks like a music note with a black background. If needed, you can install TikTok or create an account .

steps.title: Go to the user's profile.
steps.content: Go to the user's profile. If you're viewing a user's video on your For You page, you can tap their name to navigate to their profile page. You can also tap the magnifying glass icon in the top-right corner to search for a specific user. You can block any TikTok user, whether their profile is public or private.

steps.title: Tap the arrow icon in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the arrow icon in the top-right corner. This will be next to a bell icon. On some devices, this may look like a 3-dot icon. [1] X Research source A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Block.
steps.content: Tap Block . You can find this at the bottom of the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap Block again.
steps.content: Tap Block again. This will confirm the action. The user's videos will disappear, and you will see You blocked [user]. When a user is blocked, they won't be able to send you messages , see your posts, or find your profile . They also won't be notified that they are blocked.

steps.title: Go to the user's profile.
steps.content: Go to the user's profile. Since blocked users will not show up on your For You page, you can tap the magnifying glass icon to search for them manually. When the search results load, you should see Blocked by you underneath their username.

steps.title: Tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap Unblock . This is the pink-red button underneath their profile picture.

steps.title: Tap Unblock again.
steps.content: Tap Unblock again. This will confirm your action. The user will be unblocked. If you want to unblock multiple users at once, you can do so from your blocked list .

steps.title: Tap Profile.
steps.content: Tap Profile . This will be in the bottom-right corner. Your profile page will open. Use this method to find a list of all TikTok users you have blocked. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . You can find this in the top-right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . This is at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This is underneath the Account header.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Blocked accounts.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Blocked accounts . A new page will open with a list of all users you have blocked. You can quickly unblock users by tapping Unblock next to their username.
